SELECT t_appointment.* FROM t_appointment WHERE 1=1
AND t_appointment.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_appointment.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.code},'%')
AND t_appointment.item_id = #{record.itemId}
AND t_appointment.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.itemName},'%')
AND t_appointment.item_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.itemAddress},'%')
AND t_appointment.item_description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.itemDescription},'%')
AND t_appointment.item_icon LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.itemIcon},'%')
AND t_appointment.member_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.memberId},'%')
AND t_appointment.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.status},'%')
AND t_appointment.fee LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fee},'%')
AND t_appointment.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_appointment.appointment_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.appointmentTime},'%')
AND t_appointment.close_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.closeTime},'%')
AND t_appointment.member_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.memberPhone},'%')
AND t_appointment.member_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.memberName},'%')
AND t_appointment.receptionist_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.receptionistId},'%')
AND t_appointment.server_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.serverId},'%')
AND t_appointment.receptionist_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.receptionistName},'%')
AND t_appointment.server_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.serverName},'%')
AND t_appointment.payment_method = #{record.paymentMethod}
AND t_appointment.field_c LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fieldC},'%')
AND t_appointment.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{type},'%')
AND ( t_appointment.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_appointment.member_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_appointment.receptionist_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
AND t_appointment.appointment_time >= date(#{startTime}) AND t_appointment.appointment_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{endTime}), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY appointment_time DESC,create_time DESC

SELECT id AS id, CODE, `type`, item_id AS itemId, item_name AS itemName, item_address AS itemAddress, item_description AS itemDescription, item_icon AS itemIcon, member_id AS memberId, `status`, fee, create_time AS createTime, appointment_time AS appointmentTime, close_time AS closeTime, member_phone AS memberPhone, member_name AS memberName, receptionist_id AS receptionistId, server_id AS serverId, `server_name` AS serverName, receptionist_name AS receptionistName, payment_timestamp AS paymentTimestamp, payment_method AS paymentMethod, field_c AS fieldC, earliest_time AS earliestTime, latest_time AS latestTime, user_id AS userId FROM t_appointment WHERE user_id = #{memberId} AND CASE WHEN #{status} = 'DONE' THEN (t_appointment.status = 'ALREADY_TO_STORE' OR t_appointment.status = 'MISS_TO_STORE' OR t_appointment.status = 'CANCELLED' OR t_appointment.status = 'EXPIRED') WHEN #{status} = 'WAIT_TO_STORE' THEN t_appointment.status = 'WAIT_TO_STORE' ELSE NULL END
ORDER BY (CASE WHEN #{status}='DONE' THEN close_time WHEN #{status}='WAIT_TO_STORE' THEN appointment_time ELSE create_time END ) DESC
